column4: Since upgrading to 12.04, the brightness keys on my Thinkpad x121e no longer work. If I run xev or evtest to try and get the key codes, they're just completely swallowed and ignored. The volume keys (Fn-F2/F3) work, but the brightness (Fn-F8/F9) don't. Anyone have any ideas?
id check the forums and askubuntu.com for info on that exact make machine. there maybe some known issues and work arounds.
most of what I've seen is outdated, and they used to work on 11.10 but I'll keep looking.
when you hit the keys . check dmesg output soon afterwards.. see if it mentions them
